text: Christopher "Chris" O'Dowd (born 9 October 1979) is an Irish actor and comedian. He was best known for his role as Roy Trenneman in the Channel 4 comedy The IT Crowd. O'Dowd created and starred in the Sky 1 television series Moone Boy, which aired between 2012 and 2015. He had a recurring role on the drama series Girls and starred in the television series Family Tree. O'Dowd is also known for his movies, most notably Bridesmaids (2011), This Is 40 (2012), The Sapphires (2012), Thor: The Dark World (2013), Calvary (2014) and St. Vincent (2014). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Irish comedians Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish movie directors Category:Irish stage actors Category:Irish television actors Category:Irish voice actors
title: Chris O'Dowd
